Articles.Content:
I have been playing carrier and keep running short on money. I was wondering if there was a mining addon that would allow you to sell ore/kerbonite/other... 

Or some type of addon that helps me make some money?

Thanks

Have you tried putting a research lab in orbit to generate science for you and then using the admin building to convert science into funds?

I suppose you could build a drilling rig at KSC itself using empty tanks and a converter and then recover it when the tanks are full but I son't know if that would work? In theory you would get 100% refund for the ship parts plus any money for the fuel/ore you collected, don't think that would add up to very much though if anything.
You can also change the price of the resource to get more money.
